    • Method Detail

      • cancelActions

        public int cancelActions(User loggedInUser,
                java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> actionIds)
                  throws FaultException
        Cancel all actions in given list. If an invalid action is provided, none of the actions given will canceled.
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The current user
        actionIds - The list of ids for actions to cancel.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of actions with details
        Throws:
        FaultException - A FaultException is thrown if one of the actions provided is invalid.

      • listAllActions

        public java.lang.Object[] listAllActions(User loggedInUser)
        List all scheduled actions regardless of status. This includes pending, completed, failed and archived.
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The current user
        Returns:
        Returns a list of actions with details

      • rescheduleActions

        public int rescheduleActions(User loggedInUser,
                    java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> actionIds,
                    boolean onlyFailed)
                      throws FaultException
        Reschedule all actions in the given list.
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The current user
        actionIds - The list of ids for actions to reschedule.
        onlyFailed - only reschedule failed actions
        Returns:
        Returns a list of actions with details
        Throws:
        FaultException - A FaultException is thrown if one of the actions provided is invalid.

      • archiveActions

        public int archiveActions(User loggedInUser,
                 java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> actionIds)
                   throws FaultException
        Archive all actions in the given list.
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The current user
        actionIds - The list of ids for actions to archive.
        Returns:
        Returns a integer 1 on success
        Throws:
        FaultException - A FaultException is thrown if one of the actions provided is invalid.

      • deleteActions

        public int deleteActions(User loggedInUser,
                java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> actionIds)
        Delete all archived actions in the given list.
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The current user
        actionIds - The list of ids for actions to delete.
        Returns:
        Returns a integer 1 on success
        Throws:
        FaultException - In case of an error
